name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Well, if you think about it, you can only truly know that something is spoilery post-mortem.    I have a friend right now in Canada who is avoiding Facebook because the Philippines is showing Rurouni Kenshin Kyoto Inferno. Poor soul.    I'm not as obsessed with being unspoiled as he is, though I do try to avoid it. Forgive my paranoia.  :D
